import { useState } from 'react'; import Popup from 'reactjs-popup'; import img1 from "../../images/img1.jpg" import img2 from "../../images/img2.jpg" import img3 from "../../images/img3.jpg" import img4 from "../../images/img4.jpg" import "./index.css" const RoomDetails = () => { const [showCards, setShowCard] = useState(true) const [bookList, setBookList] = useState([]) const [userInfo, setUserInfo] = useState({ name: "satish", email: "", street: "", pincode: "", city: "", country: "", expires: "", cve }); const [expires, setExpires] = useState(''); const [cvc, setCvc] = useState(''); const onClickPayNow = () => { const userDetails = { name: userInfo.name, email: userInfo.email, street: userInfo.street, pincode: userInfo.pincode, city: userInfo.city, country: userInfo.country, } console.log(userDetails) } const onClickInfo = (e) => { e.preventDefault() const validation = (userInfo.email !== "") && (userInfo.street !== "") && (userInfo.pincode !== "") && ( userInfo.city !== "") && (userInfo.country !== "") console.log(userInfo.street) if(validation){ setShowCard(false) } } console.log(showCards) return(

Booking Details

Name: 26-06-2021

From Date: 26-06-2021

To Date: satish

Amount

Total Days: 3

Rent Per Day: 4500/-

Pay Now} modal className='pp'> {close => (
{showCards ? (
setUserInfo({...userInfo,email: e.target.value})}/> setUserInfo({...userInfo,street: e.target.value})}/> setUserInfo({...userInfo,pincode: e.target.value})}/> setUserInfo({...userInfo,city: e.target.value})}/> setUserInfo({...userInfo,country: e.target.value})}/>
) : (
)}
)}
) } export default RoomDetails
